com.lonepulse.robozombie
Interface Directory<NAME,OBJECT>

public interface Directory<NAME,OBJECT>

This contract defines a naming service which can be used for binding instances of a given type under an identifier and looking them up using the identifier at a later period.

Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Method Summary
 OBJECT bind(NAME name, OBJECT object)
          Retains the given object under the specified name.
 OBJECT lookup(NAME name)
          Retrieves the object which was bound under the given identifier.
 

Method Detail

bind

OBJECT bind(NAME name,
            OBJECT object)

Retains the given object under the specified name. If a binding already exists for the specified name the given object is ignored and the bound instance is returned. The object can be retrieved via lookup(Object).

Parameters:
name - the identifier to which the given object instance is bound

object - the object instance to be retained under the specified identifier

Returns:
object the object which was provided; else the previous instance if a binding existed

Since:
1.3.0

lookup

OBJECT lookup(NAME name)

Retrieves the object which was bound under the given identifier. If no binding exists for the given identifier, null is returned.

Parameters:
name - the identifier to which the required object is bound

Returns:
the bound object instance; else null if no binding exists

Since:
1.3.0
